greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals: see A128195 for details.
maple: A126062 := proc(k,n) if n = 0 then 1 ; else (n*k+1)*(A126062(k,n-1)+k^n) ; fi ; end: for diag from 0 to 10 do for k from diag to 0 by -1 do n := diag-k ; printf("%d, ",A126062(k,n)) ; od ; od ; # _R. J. Mathar_, May 18 2007
mathematica: a[_, 0] = 1; a[k_, n_] := a[k, n] = (n*k+1)*(a[k, n-1]+k^n); Table[a[k-n, n], {k, 0, 10}, {n, 0, k}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 08 2014 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2007
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, May 18 2007
